snippet.title: Steredenn: Binary Stars - Trailer (Nintendo Switch, Steam, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and iOS)
snippet.description:
Steredenn: Binary Stars is the **hugely expanded version** of the acclaimed Steredenn. http://steredenn.pixelnest.io

Available on Nintendo Switch, Steam, Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and iOS!

- Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/steredenn-binary-stars-switch
- Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/347160
- iOS: https://itunes.apple.com/app/steredenn/id916957220
- Xbox One & PlayStation 4: http://steredenn.pixelnest.io/

Steredenn: Binary Stars is an award-winning mashup of a classic shmup and a rogue-like, carved in big beautiful pixels, with insane boss battles. Fly solo or co-op with a friend, fighting off the worst scourges of space in a never-ending struggle for survival.

---

Website: http://steredenn.pixelnest.io/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelnest
Facebook: https://facebook.com/pixelneststudio
